channel.title: Agile on A Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Agile on A Blog

item.title: You don't hate Agile
item.description: Cheeky bait title aside, most probably what you actually hate isn’t even Agile but some waterfall/extreme programming Frankenstein’s monster stuck together with duct tape, sticks and misery which managers (controlling freaks) call Agile. The premise of Agile is simple, it’s all about self-governing teams which self-organize in a way that best suits their needs to create a product while at the same time stay in contact with their client and users.
